short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block chrome from accessing specific sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time Tracking on Distraction Websites:

The extension tracks the amount of time a user spends on specific websites that are categorized as distractions. 

Distraction Website Management: You can define which websites are distractions. 

Time Budgeting: Each distraction website has an associated daily time budget. 

When the you visit one of these sites, the extension calculates the remaining time budget and displays it.
